short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export and Download DALL·E 3 images from ChatGPT directly to your Computer, Notion, Airtable, Google Drive, and Dropbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly save and organize DALL·E 3-generated artwork with our extension. Choose specific images to download or capture them all in just a few clicks.

Upcoming features will enable direct exports to your preferred platforms such as Notion, Airtable, Google Drive, and Dropbox, streamlining your workflow further.

Enhance your experience in managing AI creations efficiently, with less hassle and more productivity.
